issue.title: [Java] Add non-static approach in DictionaryEncoder making it easy to extend and reuse
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6194](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6194). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As discussed in <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4994>.

Current static DictionaryEncoder has some limitation for extension and reuse.

Slightly change the APIs and migrate static method to object based approach.
